items.content_html: Minu is a lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript library aimed at enhancing web applications by allowing dynamic injection of markup into web pages and facilitating network interactions.
items.title: aotr/minu: Minu is a lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript library aimed at enhancing web applications by allowing dynamic injection of markup into web pages and facilitating network interactions.

items.content_html: Grocery List App This is a lightweight web application for managing your grocery list. Users can add, remove, and mark items as completed. The app utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend and stores data locally to maintain the list across sessions.
items.title: Keerthanas72/grocery-list: Grocery List App This is a lightweight web application for managing your grocery list. Users can add, remove, and mark items as completed. The app utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend and stores data locally to maintain the list across sessions.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Widgets is a lightweight React application showcasing the implementation of various UI components and navigation techniques without using React Router. Explore Accordion, Search, Dropdown, and Language Translate components built using class-based and functional React components.
items.title: colson0x1/widgets: Widgets is a lightweight React application showcasing the implementation of various UI components and navigation techniques without using React Router. Explore Accordion, Search, Dropdown, and Language Translate components built using class-based and functional React components.
